footer.description: AI-powered resume builder that helps you create professional, ATS-compliant resumes in minutes.

toast.register_required_description: You need to be registered to create a resume and choose a template

validation.email_invalid: Please enter a valid email address
validation.password_too_short: Password must be at least 8 characters
validation.password_requires_number: Password must contain at least one number
validation.phone_invalid: Please enter a valid phone number
validation.phone_exact_digits: Phone number must contain exactly 9 digits
validation.otp_expired: OTP code has expired. Please request a new one.
validation.date_range_invalid: End date must be after start date
validation.min_length: This field must be at least {{min}} characters
validation.max_length: This field must be no more than {{max}} characters
validation.max_value: Value must be no more than {{max}}
validation.multiple_errors: Please fix the following validation errors

general.unexpected_error: An unexpected error occurred. Please try again.
general.network_error: Network error. Please check your connection and try again.
general.server_error: Server error. Please try again later.
general.not_found: The requested resource was not found
general.bad_request: Invalid request. Please check your input.
general.timeout: Request timed out. Please try again.
general.token_limit: You don't have enough tokens to use this feature. Please check your token balance.
